content: the court of appeal in catania has issued a final ruling in a case involving elrond npl 2017 srl and the bankruptcy partners of tc di zm e c snc the court has ordered the dissolution of a community and the division of various properties among the parties involved they have also determined a cash settlement and dismissed an application for the division of a foreclosed apartment the parties have been given three months to communicate the judgment and resume enforcement proceedings the court has settled the costs of the case and allocated them proportionally among the parties involved the ruling was made on january 16 2020

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Catania sez. II, 21/01/2020, n.187
